experience: You and David both know Luke Hohmann, Mark Goldstein, and 106 others
Certified Agile Consultant, Coach, Trainer,  DAD Consultant.  ACT, AEC, PMI-ACP, SMC/CSM, SPOC/CSPO
Houston, Texas; Dallas, Texas; Las Vegas, Nevada

As the founder and CEO of AST, I am personally Scrum Alliance Certified, PMI Certified, as well as a ScrumStudy Registered Education Provider conducting industry leading on site, online and classroom based training.  My consultants are similarly  certified in their areas of expertise.I am an Enterprise-level Agile Transformation  Consultant, Coach, and Trainer. In addition, I am a DevOps, Lean and Value Stream Mapping (with or without Lean implementations but in an Agile transformation or implementation) Consultant. My current certified training classes include:  PMI-ACP Certification Preparation Course; Scrum Master / Advanced Scrum Master Certification Training; Product Owner / Advanced Product Owner Certification Training; Digital Project Management; Agile Enterprise Training; and others.  My current training to certification pass rate is 95%As AST is now self-sustaining  through my consultants and trainers, and I now have time, I am open to interesting training, coaching and consulting opportunities - how may I or my team help you?
Enterprise Agile Transformation Coach, Agile Coach/Trainer

One of the two leads on the Agile transformation for the ExxonMobil global IT team. I conducted their enterprise Agile transformation for multiple countries and continents. I designed enterprise-wide project processes, created customized, highly-detailed, yet easy to understand reporting systems for multiple concurrent enterprise projects and management levels, and implemented Agile/Scrum/Kanban/Lean processes and ceremonies.As the lead Agile Transformation Coach I directly conducted/managed/coached/and trained multiple teams on the Agile ceremonies for multiple projects, including but not limited to:•	Dependency identification and tracking•	Project Road Map and Release Planning                                            •	Iteration and Sprint Planning•	Product Backlog grooming •	Dealing with impediments•	Tracking velocity (individuals as well as teams)•	Scrum-of-Scrums•	Iterative workflow planning and analysis•	Agile testing•	Demonstrations for Stakeholder’s and other teams•	Sprint and RetrospectivesI also:•	Utilized Agile Lifecycle Management Tools (TFS)•	Provided Agile/Scrum/Kanban/Lean advocacy •	Lead Agile/Scrum/Kanban/Lean coaching and training for multiple projects•	Conducted hands-on coaching to individual teams in all aspects of Scrum and Kanban - daily routines, self-organization, collaboration, iterative development, managing flow, limiting work in progress (WIP), etc.•	Coached Agile Product Owners, Scrum Masters, Scrum Teams and Executive Sponsors•	Assisted in the creation and delivery of Agile training for business and IT resources•	Built logs to track issues, risks, key decisions, and significant change requests•	Served as PPM subject matter expert for the global PMO delivery team members and as a support resource for functional project managers•	Advanced best practices for scaling an enterprise-level Agile framework (SAFe, DAD, and XLR8)•	Developed and maintained stakeholder relationships supporting Agile product development

nTier Training is an industry leading onsite and classroom-based Agile training firm. I provide two-day intensive classes on “An Introduction to Agile for the Enterprise” as well as on SAFe and DAD implementations highly customized for each corporate/enterprise client.My current training classes include:  PMI-ACP Certification Preparation Course; Scrum Master / Advanced Scrum Master Certification Training; Product Owner / Advanced Product Owner Certification Training; Digital Project Management; Agile Enterprise Training; and others.

My work for Imparture was as a certified project management trainer conducting classes on "Digital Project Management" (both Agile and Waterfall).  These are intensive two-day public workshops that are highly personalized for 4 - 11 attendees.  I focus on the individual wants and needs of each attendee and work that into a personalized, highly educational and focused interactive curriculum for each workshop.In addition to the public workshops for Imparture, I also conduct in-house training for corporations in the Houston area.  My in-house training events focus on educating attendees on Digital Project Management (Agile and Waterfall) and incorporate the host corporation's wants and needs as well. My clients for these range from mid-size business to enterprise clients.Let me know if I can be of any assistance to you or your firm.

David Lenertz is a top-notch Scrum consultant and trainer. His breadth of knowledge in both agile process and SDLC is quite rare to find in the field, which makes him able to easily bridge gaps for clients that most of us cannot. He is fiercely tenacious on technical tasks and leads from the front with boundless energy. He also has the wisdom and humor that only comes with a great deal of experience. David is an innovator in combining his experience with technical materials which makes his trainings exciting and memorable. I highly recommend David for anything he sets his mind to.

summary: I am an Agile Certified Scrum Master, Product Owner, Agile  Expert, Agile Trainer/Coach and Disciplined Agilist.  I have consulted on, and led, numerous Agile-based Enterprise Transformations/Transitions as well as PPM, PMO, ecommerce, software, and web application development projects from inception through deployment. Key Strengths:•        +30 years of IT industry experience with the past +15 years of experience leading multiple Agile-based enterprise-level cross-functional projects from planning to closing in high-matrix organizations•        Effectively manage multiple priorities performing under pressure in fast-paced, rapidly changing environments.•        Skilled in project organization and management, problem resolution and documentation•        Adept in understanding, developing, and conducting innovative solutions to complex business problems•        Excellent interpersonal skills, hard work and dedication have built my reputation for being positive in decision making, straightforward and honest, while being flexible in problem solving.I have strong presentation skills and a driving passion for continuous improvement.  Utilizing significant interaction I guide my teams in all aspects of Agile and help them to develop the project roadmap and release plan, establish priorities, document and solve dependencies, define team requirements, and deliver business value.I bring strong leadership to deliver complex business applications, while pushing my teams and the business to exciting growth.  All while acting as a team-player and a servant leader that is comfortable dealing with all project members – from the boardroom to individual team members – all without ego or a personal agenda.I am a US Citizen currently living in Houston, Texas and I am open to consulting, coaching, training, and project opportunities throughout the USA.
name: David Lenertz
title: Enterprise Agile Transformation Coach
